rows.label: qst703002_msg0001
rows.name:
You've come at just the right time.
I could use some skilled adventurers
like you.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0002
rows.name:
I am Hal Jarque, now headed for
the Superbian warship anchored
at Lascham Cove.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0003
rows.name:
But I left the White Chair in a hurry
and forgot to bring any gifts.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0004
rows.name:
I've sent my attendants out to get some
Melosian Honey, which is famed around
these parts.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0005
rows.name: But they're still nowhere to be seen...

rows.label: qst703002_msg0006
rows.name:
This is worrying. The forest is full of
danger, so I couldn't go searching
for them even if I wanted to.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0007
rows.name: But now that you're here...

rows.label: qst703002_msg0008
rows.name:
Do you think you could bring back
my attendants who've gone to collect
the Melosian Honey?

rows.label: qst703002_msg0009
rows.name: You would be doing us a great service!

rows.label: qst703002_msg0101
rows.name:
Do you think you could bring back
my attendants who've gone to collect
the Melosian Honey?

rows.label: qst703002_msg0102
rows.name:
They should be searching for it in the
nearby flower beds...

rows.label: qst703002_msg0201
rows.name:
Thank you for helping out
my attendants.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0202
rows.name:
If we were without presents, it would
be a diplomatic faux-pas, which could
offend the Superbians and lead to war.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0204
rows.name: Very well, we should depart soon.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0205
rows.name:
Now that I have all my attendants with
me, I should arrive at Lascham Cove
much quicker.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0206
rows.name:
Well, we'd better be off...
Farewell!

rows.label: qst703002_msg0301
rows.name: Ah! We met earlier...

rows.label: qst703002_msg0302
rows.name:
I'm still very grateful for the kindness
you showed us then.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0303
rows.name:
Perhaps you followed us for
some kind of reward?

rows.label: qst703002_msg0304
rows.name:
Hm...
I am the special envoy, but I'm afraid
I can't spare any of my pocket money.

rows.label: qst703002_msg0305
rows.name:
Perhaps Mr Horrison will be more
forthcoming. Why not pester him?
